title: Did ‘@SixthFormPoet’ Really Meet His Wife at the Graveside of a Triple-Murderer?
subtitle: A viral June 2019 Twitter story had plenty of twists and turns, as well as a happy ending. But was it "entirely true," as its author claimed?
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: @SixthFormPoet's viral Twitter story about meeting his wife at the graveside of a triple-murderer was substantively accurate.
